{{Description|None can escape from the moonlight or the whispers of the night, just as no foe can flee her attentive eyes once she's got them in her sights.}}
'''Soul Reaper's Fatal Round''' is [[Chasca]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This ability has an extremely far auto-[[targeting]] range of '''25m''', currently the longest in the game.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Sparks, the Sudden Shot}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|Brim, the Sandshadow's Silhouette}}
